news.title: U.S. stocks show little reaction to Trump's extraordinary Venezuela action. Why investors see a bull case
news.summary: Investors do not expect the attack will escalate further. Geopolitical shocks historically have little impact on the stock market, and, additionally, investors do not expects the attack to escalate any further.

news.title: Deposed Venezuelan leader Maduro, wife to appear in New York court after U.S. capture
news.summary: Nicolas Maduro and his wife, Cilia Flores, were captured on Saturday by U.S. forces in Venezuela on the orders of President Donald Trump.

news.title: First GLP-1 pill for obesity from Novo Nordisk launches in the U.S.
news.summary: The drug's cash prices are among the lowest on the market. They range from $149 to $299 per month, depending on the dose.

news.title: Comcast spinoff Versant to start trading on Nasdaq
news.summary: Comcast spinoff Versant starts trading Monday. Versant is Comcast's spinoff of the majority of NBCUniversal's cable TV networks.

news.title: Chick-fil-A launches its biggest ever marketing campaign as restaurant industry traffic shrinks
news.summary: Chick-fil-A is celebrating its 50th anniversary this year. The restaurant chain is hoping to attract more customers to its restaurants.

news.title: The Fed will be forced into deep rate cuts in 2026 — boosting gold and breaking the dollar
news.summary: The next Fed chair will grapple with a deteriorating U.S. job market and slower economic growth. The next Fed Chair will have to deal with a job market that is deteriorating and slower growth.

news.title: Why this strategist only sees 3 buyable U.S. stocks at the start of 2026
news.summary: There are few equities both in an uptrend and seeing determined buyers, says Birinyi Associates. There are also few equity that are in an uprend and see determined buyers.

news.title: Inflation is likely to be a casualty of fraught superpower politics, these strategists say
news.summary: Multipolarity, deglobalization and nearshoring are trends that likely cause a structural shift higher in inflation, economists predict. Multipolarity is a state of affairs that causes inflation to rise, economists say.

news.title: ‘I’m fed up’: My selfish mother-in-law has controlled me for 30 years. How can I regain my power?
news.summary: "I'm almost 50 years old. Enough is enough," she says. "I am exhausted by it. I am exhausted.”

news.title: Taiwan Semi shares gained 45% over the last year — and Goldman just said the chip maker can do it again
news.summary: A bullish note from Goldman Sachs analysts on Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. lifted shares of the global chip manufacturer in early trade on Monday.
